input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9 ft. Flocked Snowy Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 9-Feet Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Flip Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm Winter Falls 7.5' Slim-Silhouette Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Santa Fe Fir Potted Evergreen Shrub'
  - Name='Snow Glitter Decorative Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 6ft Unlit Snow-Dusted Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Real Touch Flocked Grove Fir Full Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='HOMCOM Artificial Pencil Christmas Tree, Slim Xmas Tree Realistic Branch Tips and Plastic Stand'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company 9 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 4.5' Dunhill Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Pre-lit Artificial Full Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9 ft. Flocked Snowy Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar artificial Christmas tree with flocking and a snowy pine type, but taller and different species and not fir; flocking changes texture and appearance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 9-Feet Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product type and function, pre-lit Douglas fir tree similar in style, though taller and with different LED color; closely matches construction and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir species and flip (hinged) branch design, like the Dunhill fir; high quality and full-bodied, but brand and height differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm Winter Falls 7.5' Slim-Silhouette Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but slim silhouette, less full bodied than reference full tree; different brand and species likely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santa Fe Fir Potted Evergreen Shrub
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely smaller decorative evergreen shrub, potted and possibly real or different construction; much smaller scale and purpose.
Decorative tree rather than full artificial Christmas tree; probably small and for decoration rather than traditional Christmas tree use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6ft Unlit Snow-Dusted Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Matches height and type (full fir, unlit), with similar construction and silhouette; differs mainly by snow dusting instead of clear lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar in species and design as unlit fir tree, slightly taller but otherwise very comparable in construction and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Real Touch Flocked Grove Fir Full Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full artificial fir tree with flocking and real-touch effect; similar in function but flocked vs unlit and with different texture.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HOMCOM Artificial Pencil Christmas Tree, Slim Xmas Tree Realistic Branch Tips and Plastic Stand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim pencil silhouette tree differs in body fullness and construction style; intended purpose similar but much slimmer and less full.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Dunhill Fir product line by brand, same style with power connect and clear lights, taller version but essentially identical product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 4.5' Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Dunhill Fir tree style but smaller size and possibly unlit; very close to reference product except for height and lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Pre-lit Artificial Full Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit full artificial tree from the same brand, but unspecified species or model; similar function but less specifically matching Dunhill Fir.
